pages.cookies: Cookies Policy | Protection of your personal data Home About HOW TO PLAY FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Real11 Cookies Policy At Real11, we use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and provide personalized content and advertisements. By using our website and services, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this Cookie Policy. What Are Cookies? Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences, enhance usability, and provide personalized features. Cookies can also be used for analytics, advertising, and other operational purposes. Types of Cookies We Use 1 Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the functioning of our website. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. Without these cookies, the website may not function properly. 2 Performance and Analytics Cookies: These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often and if users experience any errors. We use this information to improve the performance and design of our website. 3 Functional Cookies: Functional cookies allow the website to remember choices you make, such as your username, language preferences, and region. They enhance your browsing experience by providing more personalized features. 4 Advertising Cookies: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to your interests. They may be used to track your browsing habits across websites and tailor advertisements to your preferences. Managing Cookies You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain types of cookies may affect the functionality of our website and limit your access to certain features. Third-Party Cookies Third-party cookies may be set on your device by external websites or services that are integrated into our website, such as social media plugins or advertising networks. Real11 does not control these cookies and is not responsible for their use. Changes to This Cookie Policy Real11 may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, industry practices, legal requirements, or our operational needs. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates. For any inquiries or concerns regarding our cookie usage, please contact us at real11@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing Real11! Whether you're plotting your next strategic move or celebrating a well-earned victory, our platform is designed to enhance every moment of your fantasy cricket journey. At Real11, we envision a world where fantasy cricket transcends the digital realm, inspiring real-world connections, strategic brilliance, and a deeper appreciation for the sport. We're committed to continuously evolving, innovating, and delivering an unparalleled experience that keeps our community engaged and excited. Real11 FANTASY CRICKET: A GUIDE TO PLAYING Step 1:Download and Register: Begin your adventure by downloading the Real11 app from the App Store or Google Play. The registration process is quick and seamless. Enter your details, verify your account, and step into a world where every match is a new opportunity. As a welcome gift, enjoy exclusive sign-up bonuses and perks that set you on the path to fantasy cricket greatness. Step 2: Select a Match: Dive into a vast selection of upcoming cricket matches. From international test matches to domestic T20 leagues, Real11 offers a variety of contests to suit your preferences. Use our unique match preview feature to get detailed insights, player statistics, and expert predictions, ensuring you make informed decisions before selecting your match. Step 3: Build Your Team: Unleash your inner strategist and build your dream team. With Real11's dynamic team creation interface, you can choose from a pool of real-life players. Utilize our AI-driven player performance indicators and predictive analytics to select the perfect combination of batsmen, bowlers, and all-rounders. Balance your team within the budget, and remember, your captain and vice-captain choices can make all the difference with double points. Step 4: Join Contests and Play: Now that your team is ready, itâ€™s time to join contests. Whether you prefer head-to-head battles, small contests with friends, or massive public leagues, Real11 has it all. Engage in live fantasy action, where you can make real-time adjustments to your team during the match. Track your performance on our interactive leaderboard and revel in the excitement as your strategic choices unfold on the field. With every contest, earn points, climb the ranks, and win fantastic rewards! FAQ'S What makes Real11 different from other fantasy cricket platforms? Real11 offers an unparalleled fantasy cricket experience with features like live fantasy action, AI-powered insights, virtual reality integration, and blockchain-backed fair play. Our unique blend of technology and community spirit sets us apart from the rest. How does the live fantasy feature work? The live fantasy feature allows you to make real-time adjustments to your team during a match. This means you can respond to the game's flow, swap players in and out, and maximize your points as the action unfolds, adding an extra layer of strategy and excitement. What is the AI-powered insights feature? Our AI-powered insights provide predictive analytics and real-time data on player performance, weather conditions, and historical trends. This helps you make informed decisions when building and managing your team, giving you a competitive edge. Can I create my own leagues on Real11? Absolutely! Real11 allows you to create custom leagues and invite friends or other users to join. Customize the league settings to suit your preferences and enjoy a personalized fantasy cricket experience. How secure is my information on Real11? We prioritize your security with blockchain technology, ensuring that all transactions and player data are tamper-proof and transparent. Your personal information is encrypted and protected with the highest standards of data security. What rewards can I earn on Real11? Our gamified rewards system offers badges, trophies, and exclusive perks based on your achievements. Participate in contests to win cash prizes, special merchandise, and unique experiences like playing in celebrity leagues. How can I track my performance during contests? Real11 provides an interactive leaderboard that updates in real-time during contests. You can see how your team is performing, compare your scores with other participants, and adjust your strategy to climb the ranks. What kind of support does Real11 offer if I encounter issues? Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any issues or queries. You can reach out to us via live chat, email, or our comprehensive help center, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable experience on Real11.
